EmailTemplate.subject: Primus Epic速 2.0 for the AW139 helicopter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for your interest in our Primus Epic速 2.0 for the AW139 helicopter. You will shortly be contacted by a member of our team to discuss your requirements in more detail.
In the meantime please click here <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/N61-0799-000-000_237-Primus Epic for AW139.pdf> to view our brochure for more information.
Kind regards,
Honeywell Aerospace
